mapper.update: update t_restaurant set restaurant_Name = #{restaurantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_Name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adderss = #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_Date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_Registration_Certificate = #{taxRegistrationCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, restaurant_Name, short_Name, tel, adderss, description, url, begin_Date, account, tax_Registration_Certificate, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_restaurant where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, restaurant_Name, short_Name, tel, adderss, description, url, begin_Date, account, tax_Registration_Certificate, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_restaurant
